name: L6 DMC 03 - 'No Reflections'
description:
No Reflections is a 3D horror game made using Unreal Engine 4 where you use a set of mirrors to reflect a ray of light in order to illuminate your surroundings and beat the maze-like level design. 

The concept started from the idea of removing a main mechanic of any game genre and replacing it with another mechanic that would otherwise solve the issue. So we have taken on to the horror genre games and removed the famous yet overused 'carry-your-own-light-source' mechanic. In No Reflections there's no lamp, camera or torch you could carry around. Just you, a light ray and a bunch of mirrors... and the spooky demon waiting around the corner to reap your soul. 

.

.

.

Joking, there's no scary demon - but we have a timer which is equally spooky. 

BOO!
